frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining romantic-themed OKLCH colors, dark mode variants, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin integrations for styling.
